Detailed Description

Zee Fit class: BW+CB and Cruijff.

Description: class that provide flexible and simple way to fit the Zee invariant mass shape with different pdfs:

  • BW+CB
  • Cruijff

Member Function Documentation

void ZFit_class::SetFitPar ( RooFitResult *  fitres_MC = NULL  )  [private]

if fitres_MC != NULL take the fit parameters from that and set fit_type for the pdf to fit_type, put fit_type=0 otherwise
